title: This Morning: Jennifer Lopez demands cookie at a certain temperature
text:
She's known as one of the world's greatest divas and Jennifer Lopez proved to be just that ahead of an appearance on This Morning recently.

According to Phillip Schofield, 57, the singer, 50, threw the show into chaos when her team insisted that she was given a cookie upon arrival, which was warmed to a certain temperature.

They insisted that the star, who was on the show to talk about her style secrets, should also be served with a glass of full fat milk, which should be served cold.

Phillip and co-star Holly Willoughby, 38, poked fun at the singer on This Morning on Monday as they tucked into their own milk and cookies.

But a source close to J.Lo is adamant that no catering demands made, telling MailOnline on Monday afternoon: 'It's blatantly not true. It didn't happen.'

Scroll down for video

Jenny from the choc! Phillip Schofield claimed that Jennifer Lopez threw This Morning into chaos when she demanded her cookie was warmed to a certain temperature

Phillip began by telling viewers: 'One secret J. Lo didn’t mention was her love for milk and cookies.'

Holly continued: 'More specifically a cookie warmed to the perfect temperature with a glass of full fat milk, cold.'

Phillip added: 'There was quite a commotion when they worried the cookie wasn’t the right temperature.

Taking the biscuit: Jennifer appeared on the show to talk about her style secrets, but not before she had her cookie and a glass of full fat milk, served cold

'If you want Jennifer’s real secret to looking fabulous at 50, this is it.'

While Holly tucked into her own milk and cookies, she said playfully, 'it's gooey and I'm not complaining.'

Phillip then pretended to be having a meltdown of his own.

Phillip said: 'There was quite a commotion when they worried the cookie wasn’t the right temperature. 'If you want Jennifer’s real secret to looking fabulous at 50, this is it'

While Holly tucked into her own milk and cookies, she said playfully, 'it's gooey and I'm not complaining'

He said: 'She has ordinary milk and for some strange reason I’ve got hot milk. And I can’t do hot milk. this is filthy. I can’t be doing that.'

While on the show, Jennifer admitted that sometimes she struggles to juggle her busy lifestyle.

She said: '[I try] to work out even when I don't want to three of four times a week for an hour. try to get good sleep. Try to have balance.

'It's not always easy. I have kids. I’m in a relationship. Sometimes I feel overwhelmed juggling all the things I'm doing but I think I’m doing okay.'
